summary: Request to expose a replay-safe metric meter from Ruby workflows, similar to Python and .NET SDKs, to allow recording metrics inside workflow code.
userImpact: Ruby developers cannot record metrics from within workflows, limiting observability compared to other Temporal SDKs.
proposedFix: Expose replay-safe metric_meter similar to Python and .NET implementations
resolutionDetails: Consolidated into #183 for broader workflow support implementation
keyQuote: expose replay-safe `Temporalio::Workflow.metric_meter` for recording metrics inside workflows
